analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag dngos po ji srid pa la dmigs pa dang po'i rnal 'byor gyi sa'o /

original: ming tsam ste /
analyzed: ming tsam ste /

analyzed: shin tu tha dad pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de bzhin du ji srid chos thams cad ming tsam mo //

analyzed: de nas gzugs med pa nas ji srid chos thams cad do //

analyzed: de la 'di dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa tsam ste ;

analyzed: yang sems las phyi rol du gyur pa'i sems kyi gzung ba'i don ci yang cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //

translated: Then, based on the attainment of pliancy, one should repeatedly analyze the objects of samƒÅdhi in various ways.

analyzed: khams bcva brgyad po 'di dag thams cad sna tshogs rang bzhin med pa sems tsam ste /
translated: All of these eighteen constituents are mind only, various and essenceless.

analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med pa'o //

translated: In the same way, when one repeatedly discerns, fully discerns, fully investigates, and fully explores this,

analyzed: sems shin tu sbyangs pa de'i tshe lhag mthong ngo //
translated: at that time, when there is serenity of body and mind, that is insight.

translated: After that, the union of serenity and insight is the path of the union of serenity and insight, which is the uninterrupted mental attention to both the image and the objective support of that non-discursive thought, and the mental attention to the equality of both.

translated: This is the third stage, which is the stage of the object of observation of the instructions of the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: gang yang don so sor snang ba 'di lta ste phung po dang khams dang skye mched du so sor snang ba nas /

translated: All of these are the signs of the cause of error, the signs of conceptual proliferation, the signs of error,

analyzed: 'khrul pa'i dmigs pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are the objects of error.

original: der snang ba la sogs pa'i blo yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam pa des bslad pas snang ba de la dmigs pas kun tu snang ba nyid ces bya ba de 'khrul pa la dmigs pa yin par brjod do //
